title: The Guiding Light of Ursula Russell

story.text: Ursula Russell, a well-loved theater director, discovers a glowing amulet buried beneath her theater that imparts the power to see into the future. She envisions a catastrophic event occurring by week's end.
Ursula uses her vision to avert a disaster at a local school, guiding everyone to safety after foreseeing a structural collapse. Her heroic actions start to draw media attention.
Despite the misgivings about her newfound powers, Ursula is determined to make a difference. She spends the day rescuing a family from a house fire predicted in her premonitory glimpses.
She directs her focus towards crime prevention, thwarting a bank robbery by guiding the police discreetly with precise instructions derived from her visions.
Ursula senses a rapid increase in her powers, realizing she can now extend her foresight to help not just her city, but surrounding regions as well.
With her guidance, emergency services efficiently minimize the impact of a severe storm, saving countless lives. Ursula becomes a local legend known as 'The Guiding Light'.
Reflecting on her eventful week, Ursula decides to embrace her role as a superhero fully, using her abilities to direct those in peril to safety.

ending: As the curtain fell on a heroic week, Ursula Russell knew that her greatest productions were yet to come.
moral: True heroism consists in being superior to the crises of life and using one's gifts for the greater good.
